price: Hanyuma ba bandi bihemukiye babwirwe bati “Ngaho nimwumve ububabare bw’ibihano bihoraho. Ese hari ikindi muhaniwe kitari ibyo mwakoraga?”
arabic: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma qīla lilladhīna ẓalamū dhūqū ʿadhāba al-khul'di hal tuj'zawna illā bimā kuntum taksibūna
